教师队伍

首页 > 师资队伍 > 教师队伍 > 正文

李乐飞副教授，系党委书记

  • 姓名：李乐飞

  • 办公电话：

  • 邮箱：lilefei@tsinghua.edu.cn

  • 传真号码：

  • 地点：清华大学舜德楼402A

  • 教师主页：

个人简介

李乐飞，清华大学工业工程系党委书记，长聘副教授，博士生导师。主要从事系统工程、体系工程、复杂系统建模与仿真、服务运作管理等方面的教学和科研工作。于2002年获得浙江大学电子工程学士学位，2004年获得美国亚利桑那大学工业工程硕士学位，2006年获得美国亚利桑那大学系统与工业工程博士学位，2006年9月开始在清华大学工业工程系工作至今。现任清华大学工业工程系复杂系统工程研究中心执行副主任、清华大学智慧物流与供应链系统研究中心执行副主任、清华大学质量与可靠性研究院副院长、清华大学医工交叉研究院常务副院长兼秘书长、曾担任山东省胶州市人民政府副市长（挂职）。学术任职方面，李乐飞老师担任IEEE Intelligent Systems, IEEE Transactions on Intelligent Vehicles (TIV), Asia-Pacific Journal of Operations Research (APJOR), Digital Transformation & Society期刊的副编以及自动化学报和指挥与控制通讯的编委。曾承办三次INCOSE（国际系统工程协会）北京高峰论坛，任多届国际复杂系统设计与管理会议（CSD&M）、IEEE数字孪生和平行智能国际会议（DTPI）、平行智能大会等会议的主席、程序副主席、分论坛主席等职。同时，李乐飞老师曾任INCOSE学术委员会主任助理、北京分会主席，现任INCOSE北京分会副理事长、中国物流学会常务理事、中国电子学会工业工程分会委员、中国兵器学会体系工程专委会副主任委员等职。

发表论著

注：指导的学生姓名后标有&，带有*为文章的通讯作者

期刊论文

1.Jing, Z.&, L. Li, Y. Lyu, R. Wang, Y. Wang, D. Wang, and F.-Y. Wang*. 2023. “Autonomous Services: The Evolution of Services Through Intelligent Vehicles.” IEEE Transactions on Intelligent Vehicles 8(11): 4468-4473.

2.Wang, R.&, X. Liu, X. Xie, and L. Li*. 2023. “Robust Elective Hospital Admissions with Contextual Information.” IEEE Transactions on Automation Science and Engineering, 1-19.

3.Wang, R.&, K. S. Shehadeh*, X. Xie, and L. Li. 2023. “Data-Driven Integrated Home Service Staffing and Capacity Planning: Stochastic Optimization Approaches.” Computers & Operations Research 159: 106348.

4.Ni, S.&, S. Hu, and L. Li*. 2022. “An Intention-Aware Markov Chain Based Method for Top-K Recommendation.” IEEE Transactions on Automation Science and Engineering, 1–12.

5.Ni, S.&, X. Bai, and L. Li*. 2022. “Behind the Heterogeneous Trade Effects of Standards: Multi-Sector Evidence from China.” Journal of Asian Economics 82: 101513.

6.Wang, R.&, Y. Zhang, and L. Li*. 2022. “Semiparallel Service Systems in CPSS: Theory and Application.” IEEE Transactions on Computational Social Systems, 1–15.

7.Ni, S.&, X. Bai, Y. Liang, Z. Pang, and L. Li*. 2022. “Blockchain-Based Traceability System for Supply Chain: Potentials, Gaps, Applicability and Adoption Game.” Enterprise Information Systems 16 (12): 2086021.

8.Zhang, Y.&, W. Dong, J. Wang, C. Che, and L. Li*. 2022. “The Development of Digital Thread: The Relations to Digital Twin and Its Industrial Applications.” Digital Transformation and Society.

9.Cui, F.&, C. Wang, and L. Li*. 2021. “A PageRank-like Measure for Evaluating Process Flexibility.” IISE Transactions 0 (0): 1–15.

10.Zhao, L.&, L. Li*, and Z.-J. M. Shen. 2020. “Transactional and In-Store Display Data of a Large Supermarket for Data-Driven Decision-Making.” Naval Research Logistics (NRL) 67 (8): 617–26.

11.Li, Y.&, G. Zhang, Z. Pang, and L. Li*. 2020. “Continuum Approximation Models for Joint Delivery Systems Using Trucks and Drones.” Enterprise Information Systems 14 (4): 406–35.

12.Cui, F.&, L. Ma, G. Hou, Z. Pang, Y. Hou, and L. Li*. 2020. “Development of Smart Nursing Homes Using Systems Engineering Methodologies in Industry 4.0.” Enterprise Information Systems 14 (4): 463–79.

13.de Weck, O.*, D. Krob, L. Li, P. C. Lui, A. Rauzy, and X. Zhang. 2020. “Handling the COVID‐19 Crisis: Toward an Agile Model‐based Systems Approach.” Systems Engineering, sys.21557.

14.Wang, P., L. Yang*, N. Zhao, L. Li, and D. Wang. 2021. “A New SORM Method for Structural Reliability with Hybrid Uncertain Variables.” Applied Sciences 11 (1): 346.

15.Tsao, L., L. Li, and L. Ma*. 2019. “Human Work and Status Evaluation Based on Wearable Sensors in Human Factors and Ergonomics: A Review.” IEEE Transactions on Human-Machine Systems 49 (1): 72–84
